title: Product Web App
shortDesc: A web app show casing the use of motion effects, 3D rendering and integration of backend services.
longDesc:
Software/Tools: Remix/React, Tailwind CSS, .NET, MongoDB, Netlify, GitHub Actions

The project demo is deployed to Netlify using a basic CI/CD configuration with GitHub Actions with the backend services deployed to Azure App Service.

title: This Portfolio!
shortDesc: A mobile friendly responsive design portfolio in NextJS with modular components.
longDesc:
Software/Tools: NextJS/React, Tailwind CSS, Vercel, GitHub Actions

The project demo is deployed to Vercel using a basic CI/CD configuration with GitHub Actions.
